code: export var getToken=function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem('auth_token');};export var deleteToken=function deleteToken(){return localStorage.removeItem('auth_token');};export var setTokenUtils=function setTokenUtils(token){localStorage.setItem('auth_token',token);};export var setAdminUtils=function setAdminUtils(data){setTokenUtils(data.token);localStorage.setItem('admin_data',JSON.stringify(data));window.location.assign("/admin/dashboard");};export var getAdminUtils=function getAdminUtils(itemkey){var item=localStorage.getItem(itemkey);var item_=item?JSON.parse(item):"";return item_;};export var reloadPage=function reloadPage(){setTimeout(function(){window.location.reload();},2000);};
